20110111020710.000|20110111020710.000|CC1|PATTERN.                        
20110111020710.000|20110111020711.000|CC1|EVERY TIME THIS HAPPENS WE LOOK 
20110111020711.000|20110111020713.000|CC1|FOR ANSWERS AND EXPLANATIONS AND
20110111020713.000|20110111020715.000|CC1|LESSONS IN THE SPECIFICS OF THE 
20110111020715.000|20110111020716.000|CC1|PARTICULAR CASE.                
20110111020716.000|20110111020717.000|CC1|IN THIS CASE, THE POTENTIAL     
20110111020717.000|20110111020719.000|CC1|MENTAL ILLNESS OF THE ALLEGED   
20110111020719.000|20110111020720.000|CC1|SHOOTER, THE EFFORT TO TRY TO   
20110111020720.000|20110111020722.000|CC1|FIND SOME POLITICAL COHERENCE,

20110111020726.000|20110111020727.000|CC1|WHETHER IT WAS HIS BELIEFS THAT 
20110111020727.000|20110111020728.000|CC1|NOTE INVESTIGATED THE SHOOTING, 
20110111020728.000|20110111020729.000|CC1|WHAT EXACTLY THIS KILLER WAS
